0.9.name: wordpress/sidenotes
0.9.description:
This plugin provides the possibility to simply add short side notes to your Wordpress blog, showing the date of publication, a title and a description. In addition the plugin provides a link to the site the side notes refers to. Simply activate it and add new side notes within the "Tools" admin panel. To show off your side notes just put <?php get_sidenotes(); ?> in your template. For easy syndication this plugin provides an additional RSS feed. The default URL of the feed is http://example.com/feed/sidenotes.

Related Links: Plugin Homepage Plugin Demo
